attributes.review: This app is slow, buggy, and glitchy it’s made my whole phone slow and the worst part is after a week I couldn’t even open it anymore it took forever to delete and took my phone 1 and a half to stop being so glitchy but it’s made my phone permanently slow like slower than its ever been I would leave 0 stars if I could WORST APP EVER 😡. (P.S Donald Trump is racist)
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: The worst app ever, it wiped all my apps, made my phone shut down multiple time and my phone keeps glitching, it’s not useful and it just messes up Apple iPhones according to other reviews, countless people have suffered the same issues. I’m pretty sure this app just downloads a virus into the Apple phones, I wish I could give it zero stars, the worst app ever!!!!
attributes.title: This app should be deleted!!

attributes.review: Absolutely terrible app. While I was signing up for one of Trump’s rallies (which I later realized I couldn’t attend because I had to drive my fish to the orthodontist’s), a video chat suddenly popped up. There sat Donald Trump himself, who screamed “all lives matter” and “white power,” then left. I still have nightmares to this day because not only was that abrupt entrance terrifying, he himself— just his physical appearance— ugh. Frightening.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I opened the app with the intentions of supporting the Cheeto puff in office but was majorly disappointed when it asked for my number. See this wouldn’t be a big deal if I didn’t hear the “rumors” of him being a child predator but I did it anyway because you gotta support to orange 🍊. Then the app just glitched and way a orange screen scaring my imaginary gold fish giving it a stroke leading to its tragic unexpected death. DO NOT RECOMMEND🖕😡
attributes.title: APP KILLED MY GOLDFISH 🤬🤬🤬

attributes.review: it literally took DAYS to download and then when i opened the app it jus showed pictures of a oven baked cheeto naked🤬😱 AND THEN everytime i would try and log out it would play a video of massimo saying “are u lost babygorl😏” i haven’t been able to do anything on my phone for weeks now👿 i am very unhappy with this app and will NOT be recommending it to anyone‼️‼️ trump2020🙈❤️❤️...dead🧚🏽‍♂️✨✨
attributes.title: it gave me viruses😾😤

attributes.review: after taking 3 weeks to download it replaced all my photos with Donald trumps exposed nudes still crying in the bathroom from the horror😭 after taht I kept getting notifications saying how trump just got an orange spray tan I really don’t care about that then I got another one saying that I looked like an ugly cow today so rude then the app tracked down where I lived and now my rooms covered in posters of trump pls do not get this app
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: Took a week to download. It hacked my phone and I have to get a new phone number. It messed with my contacts and called 911. Unless you want to be hacked and get all your information deleted and messed up you should get the app if you like those things done to your phone. My grandma tried this app and had to get a whole new phone.
attributes.title: Worst thing ever

attributes.review: Trump was impeached. He is by far one of the worst presidents this country has ever faced. And only got elected through the electoral college with a 56.5% he lost the popular vote by 48.2%. He is an embarrassment to this country.  He’s proven through his own statements he is racist, homophobic, sexist, and overall an idiot. I only got the app to get tickets for his rallies and not go. If you support trump you are a white supremacist. ✨🏳️‍🌈❣️🥰✨🧚🏽‍♂️🧚❤️💜💙💙✨🌸🌺✨🌟⭐️💫
attributes.title: Trump is racist, homophobic, and sexist

attributes.title: No just no

attributes.review: You know I come to this app thinking like, how, how can I help. Is there any way that I can contribute but I am met with complete inappropriate content. My eyes they were blinded, you probably think that’s crazy how are you typing, I’m using the microphone. And even thought I’m blinded forever, it’s still the most ridiculous app I will ever see. The only app I will ever see. Wear a mask. 😭😡🤣
attributes.title: Ridiculous
